data.text: @HighestLoyalty @celinegounder @TheAtlantic @KatherineJWu You are forgetting that this particular hack was pushing for letting the virus run wild when there were no interventions.  No vaccines, no medications.  You may not be phased by almost 1 million dead in two years, but if this man had had his way it would have been double.

@celinegounder @TheAtlantic @KatherineJWu Thank you @KatherineJWu for providing a voice to experts on the ground. New policies feel like an undermining of what we just went through in healthcare, like none of it mattered.

@celinegounder @TheAtlantic @KatherineJWu Can some rational person please invest the time to shred this ridiculous propaganda-laden article from The Atlantic? I just lack the energy at the momentâ€¦PS- @celinegounder is doing a fine job of parroting The Narrative based on The Science(tm).

@celinegounder @TheAtlantic @KatherineJWu Too going on for so long with no n95 or equivalent but having kids in-person by recommendation of @AmerAcadPeds & @CDCDirector since June 2020 with no Vaxx was counter the evidence of a need for respirators.

@celinegounder @TheAtlantic @KatherineJWu A far argument, but their was some early sabotage in the Spring on 2021. The press to Vaxx everyone presented doubt in the benefit of masking. Also keeping it regional and not national further harmed the campaign. Lastly the dropping of indoor in May 2021, made it optional.

@celinegounder @RobertDPutnam @shaylynromney Were government-imposed shutdowns, capacity controls, mask mandates ever about protecting individuals from COVID? or always about preventing local healthcare systems from getting overwhelmed?
@celinegounder @TheAtlantic @KatherineJWu The only thing that unifies Americans is a disdain for collective action. Nothing poisons us like our internalized movie cowboy mythology.

@celinegounder @TheAtlantic @KatherineJWu Reminder for Cece, The Atlantic, & Miss Wu. We had the definitive solution early on. Do not ever silence the highest qualified experts again. Sad chapter in US history. https://t.co/6ft956i9lq

@celinegounder @TheAtlantic @KatherineJWu Fake Fraudulent Fabricated Fsllacy. Everyone is not at equal risk.We have seen the Catastrophric Collateral deaths,societal decay, generational harms to children w this approach of Indirect Protection. Focused Protection was/ is the definitive solution. No debating this Cece. https://t.co/NJjj02OVEO
